General.Name: Hempacco Co. Inc.
General.Description: Hempacco Co., Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of smokable hemp and herb products in California. It offers The Real Stuff hemp smokables and flavored hemp rolling papers. The company was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in San Diego, California. Hempacco Co., Inc. is a subsidiary of Green Globe International, Inc.
General.Address: 9925 Airway Road, San Diego, CA, United States, 92154

2.Name: Mr. Jorge  Olson
2.Title: Chief Marketing Officer, Exec. VP & Director
